pro read_niriss_siaf_mini rcs_id="$Id: read_niriss_siaf_mini.pro,v 1.2 2018/02/27 20:43:40 penton Exp $" FF='(A,A,A,A,A,I,I,F,F,I,I,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,I,F,I,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,A,I,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F,F)' dir=jwst_get_dir() datdir=jwst_get_dir(/dat) txtdir=jwst_get_dir(/txt) siafdir=jwst_get_dir(/siaf) file='NIRISS_SIAF_mini.txt' savefile='NIRISS_SIAF_mini.dat' names="InstrName AperName DDCName AperType V2Ref V3Ref' message,/info,'READING '+siafdir+file svp_readcol,siafdir+file,InstrName,AperName,DDCName,AperType,V2Ref,V3Ref svp_forprint,InstrName,AperName,DDCName,AperType,V2Ref,V3Ref stop end
